mapper.select: select umoments.id, umoments.user_id,u.nickname, umoments.create_time, umoments.del_flag, umoments.content,umoments.origin,umoments.linkProject,umoments.linkCategory from user_moments umoments,user u where umoments.user_id in ( select fuser.user_id from follow_user fuser where fuser.follower_id=#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and fuser.del_flag !=1 ) and u.id=umoments.user_id and umoments.del_flag !=1 and u.del_flag !=1 order by umoments.create_time desc
